DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Naldemedine Treating Opioid-induced Constipation
DOC.detailed_description: This Phase 3 , multi-center , randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled , parallel-group study evaluate efficacy safety naldemedine 0.2 mg daily versus placebo treatment subject non-malignant chronic pain OIC .
